code: import AgreeAll from"../atoms/agreeButtons/agreeAll";import AgreeButton from"../atoms/agreeButtons/agreeButton";import ConsntButton from"../atoms/agreeButtons/consntButton";import OfferButton from"../atoms/agreeButtons/offerButton";import SearchAbout from"../atoms/agreeButtons/searchAbout";import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AgreeButtonGroup=props=>{const[all,setAll]=useState(false);const[consnt,setConsnt]=useState(false);const[offer,setOffer]=useState(false);const[search,setSearch]=useState(false);const[agree,setAgree]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{if(all){setConsnt(true);setOffer(true);setSearch(true);setAgree(true);}if(!all){setAgree(false);setConsnt(false);setOffer(false);setSearch(false);}props.setInfo(prevState=>{return{...prevState,cCheck:all};});},[all,consnt,offer,search,agree]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"w-full px-4  pb-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AgreeAll,{all:all,setAll:setAll}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ConsntButton,{consnt:consnt,setConsnt:setConsnt}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SearchAbout,{search:search,setSearch:setSearch}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(OfferButton,{offer:offer,setOffer:setOffer}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AgreeButton,{agree:agree,setAgree:setAgree})]});};export default AgreeButtonGroup;
